channel.title: Networking on netsplit
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on netsplit

item.title: Setting up a home intercom using Cisco 7941G phones
item.description: This is a guide on how to set up Cisco 7941G phones as an intercom system.

item.title: How to build a remote Proxmox and pfSense lab on an OVH dedicated server
item.description: This is a guide on how to set up a remote "lab" with multiple IP addresses on an OVH dedicated server using Proxmox and a pfSense router.
